title: Trading B2B, B2B2C, C2C, D2C
paragraph1: Trading can be done in various directions (B2B, B2B2C, C2C, D2C) and industries.
paragraph2: Here is an example for an airline industry: For instance, Bob buys a flight ticket to Norway and because of various reasons he is unable to take the flight and wants to 'trade' his flight ticket to Anna who wants to buy the ticket for a certain price.
paragraph3: This would be done over a smart contract. Bob is able to sell his flight ticket & receives money and Anna is able to use his flight ticket and take the trip to Norway.

title: Incentives
paragraph1: Incentives are there to encourage people using various services on the Blockchain.
paragraph2: This will help companies to build their product and gain more customers.
paragraph3: Moreover it could for instance help airlines to avoid over booking of flights

title: Loyalty
paragraph1: With our loyalty use case, users can save all their loyalty cards in one wallet and use it in various shops.
paragraph2: In the US, an individual belongs to about 16 loyalty programs. For every program they hold a physical card.
paragraph3: Here we already partner with Miles & More which opens access to a number of partners joining us on the Blockchain.

title: Wallet rates
paragraph1: Wallet rates are direct rates from the business. May it be an airline or a small boutique hotel. Here you get your rates straight from the business.

title: Digital collectibles
paragraph1: Travellers love to collect things from their trip. Therefore, a use case of digital collectibles is very interesting and can be adopted in various directions.
paragraph2: From a collectible from a hotel to a local shop. Each business would generate this as an NFT and the end user can then collect these in their personal wallet.

title: Hotel / roomtype mapping
paragraph1: Each room can have an individual wallet. This will help the hotel owner to offer selected rooms to the end user and the end / other can send information to that wallet.
paragraph2: This will in the end give the user as much information as needed for a specific room. Things that could be send to a wallet address of a room:
paragraph3: NFTs, Pictures, Reviews, Experiences, Architecture, Products used in that room and offered of the hotel.

title: Quality/ verification Seal (NFT)
paragraph1: As a business you can add a seal to your product/ service so users can see that it is verified by your business.

title: Souvenirs (NFT)
